channel.title: [pi] got problem with duel arena help me pl0x
channel.description: i have duel arena fully working but i dont have the option to duel on the player like it says follow trade cancel i wanna know how to add the button duel option thing please help. :/ and ik it fully works because it said when i dl'ed it. from the guy who adv it.

item.title: [pi] got problem with duel arena help me pl0x
item.dc:creator: @voodoo74502 voodoo74502
item.description:
@voodoo74502 wrote:

okay so like i found out how to fix it its just 3, 0, “attack” 1
3, 0, “challenge” 1
as well but now i have a problem where the icon just keeps flashing constantly…

Read full topic

item.title: [pi] got problem with duel arena help me pl0x
item.dc:creator: @pro_banana pro banana
item.description:
@pro_banana wrote:

[quote=“voodoo74502, post:1, topic:385264”]i have duel arena fully working but i dont have the option to duel on the player like it says follow trade cancel i wanna know how to add the button duel option thing please help.
and ik it fully works because it said when i dl’ed it. from the guy who adv it.[/quote]

if(duelStatus == 5) {
                                getPA().showOption(3, 0, "Attack", 1);
                        } else {
                                getPA().showOption(4, 0, "Challenge", 1);
                        }
}

Edit: I’m having the same problem I’ll look for a fix.

Read full topic
item.source: [pi] got problem with duel arena help me pl0x

item.title: [pi] got problem with duel arena help me pl0x
item.dc:creator: @voodoo74502 voodoo74502
item.description:
@voodoo74502 wrote:

that does not work you have to have this.
if(duelStatus == 5) {
getPA().showOption(3, 0, “Attack”, 1);
} else {
getPA().showOption(1, 0, “Challenge”, 1);
}
but when i do that when i challenge i keep the challenge option not the attack option maybe its something wrong with the show option thing…?

Read full topic
item.source: [pi] got problem with duel arena help me pl0x

item.title: [pi] got problem with duel arena help me pl0x
item.dc:creator: @classy_zezima classy zezima
item.description:
@classy_zezima wrote:

Find where it the duel arena coding is and try adding thing.

if(duelStatus == 5) {
getPA().showOption(3, 0, “Attack”, 1);
} else {
getPA().showOption(3, 0, “Challenge”, 1);
}
